1370: Hodine moved to Muelen straet.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Vastraid at age 27 in 1370.
Gave birth to Vastraid in 1370 at age 27.
1371: Gave birth to Thomas in 1371 at age 28.
1372: Gave birth to Soeten in 1372 at age 29.
1376: Gave birth to Sollen in 1376 at age 33.
1378: Gave birth to Alebaren in 1378 at age 35.
1379: Gave birth to Heideric in 1379 at age 36.
1383: Gave birth to Salome in 1383 at age 40.
Lost son Alebaren when Alebaren was 6 years old.
